summary: A sadistic serial killer terrorizes a couple driving on a rural highway in Texas while killing numerous people and framing them for his killings.
cast: Jake Busey|Kari Wuhrer|C. Thomas Howell|Shaun Johnston|Marty Antonini|Darcy Dunlop|Duncan Fraser|Mackenzie Gray|Stephen Hair|Terry King|Doug MacLeod|Austen Meadows|Janne Mortil|Valerie Planche|Jim Rattai|Stephen Strachan|Randy Birch|Tom Carey|Jim Dunn|Brett Manyluk|Steve Railsback
keywords: repeat sequel|serial killer|police|hitchhiker|returning character killed off
title: Carretera al infierno II
